title: Hackterms
subtitle: Urban Dictionary for programming terms
description: I built Hackterms to be able to quickly look up programming terms without going down a rabbit hole of tutorials and arguments. I grew it to 1300 definitions from over a thousand contributors.

title: GemFM
subtitle: Discover your next favorite podcast episode
description: GemFM is a recommendation engine for great podcast episodes powered by the Spotify and iTunes APIs. Users can rate, comment on, and tag episodes.

title: TinyLogger
subtitle: A minimal blogging platform for focused writers
description: TinyLogger is a minimal, distraction-free blogging platform. The minimal interface auto-saves, cleverly hides distractions, and focuses the user on writing.

title: Trakr
subtitle: Keep tabs on your daily spending
description: Named after a heroic 9/11 dog, Trakr is a personal budgeting app. Users can enter and tag expenses, review a monthly dashboard, and see charts and graphs of their spending analytics.

title: MaximPekarsky.com
subtitle: Check out this Max guy
description: This portfolio is built with React.js, TypeScript, and styled-components. It's hosted as a static site on Firebase.

title: Space Squares!
subtitle: Defeat the evil square invaders
description: Battle swarms of flesh-eating Space Squares in this throwback arcade game

title: WordSync
subtitle: What word am I thinking of?
description: A sockets.io powered Node/Express/MongoDB game that challenges two players to think of the same word at the same time?

title: Song Quiz
subtitle: Guess the song name from a snippet.
description: SongQuiz picks a random lyric snippet from a random song, and challenges the user to guess what the song is. It currently works with lyrics from 6 bands.

title: Traffic Simulator
subtitle: Hey, I'm trying to pass here!
description: A traffic simulator built with vanilla JS and HTML canvas

title: Text Clock
subtitle: Because words are better than numbers.
description: A text clock with several color themes, including a festive Christmas theme

title: WTF is today?
subtitle: What obscure food/science/awareness holiday is today?
description: What obscure food/science/awareness holiday is today?

title: Coin Flipper
subtitle: Will it be heads... or tails?
description: A black/white grid generator based on coin flips - inspired by a reddit post.
